name: Oxygen Concentrator
description:
74-year-old elderly lady has late-stage cancer. She requires an oxygen concentrator to help with breathlessness. Family has financial difficulties and is unable to afford the cost of renting or buying one. Looking for a donor who has a secondhand one in good condition. 

Pls contact me at 97274215 via Whatsapp. Thank you.

passiton.name: Oxygen Concentrator
passiton.description: It's an working Oxygen Concentrator used for people whom has difficulty in breathing and has been advised by doctor to use the machine for relax breathing.New tubes available too

name: Wheelchair
description: Client comes from a low-income family. He is an above-knee bilateral amputee and would require a 4-wheeler motorised Personal Mobility Aid (PMA) to travel around for his medical appointments and to seek employment.

passiton.name: WheelChair
passiton.description:
Wheelchair is older than 4 years old. is the heavier metal model. bought a replacement lighter model for my mom and thus have this as a spare sitting in the storeroom. 

item is still good condition with the basic function still working. (brakes, seats, footrest etc)

passiton.name: Manual Wheelchair x 3 sets
passiton.description: 3 sets of standard wheelchairs up for donation.
passiton.location: Ang Mo Kio, Bishan, Braddell, Thomson

name: Cupboard
description: Family of 3 on ComCare assistance requires a replacement of their cupboard which is damaged.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Cheng San 445
contact.name: Nur Ain Afini Binte Hamdan

passiton.name: Desk with cupboard
passiton.description: This is a great piece of furniture for a schoolchild or simple home office. One drawer has a slightly loose bottom panel but it can all be fixed with some glue. I have been using this personally. Giving it up because moving to a small flat.

name: Geriatric Chair
description: Elderly client who is diagnosed with stroke requires geriatric chair for sleeping/sitting. Current geriatric chair has malfunction and he does not have the financial means to repair it. Client looking for a working condition which allows to recline.

contact.org: NTUC Health Cluster Support - Taman Jurong
contact.name: Muhammad Azfar Bin Nazri

passiton.name: Geriatric chair
passiton.description: item was being use less than 3 months. Wish to donate out to the less fortunate people who needs it more. Thank you

name: Geriatric Chair
description:
Elderly advance-stage cancer patient with multiple co-morbidities is in need of replacement geriatric chair as current chair has faulty wheel-locks and worn out due to daily use and wear and tear.

Family is in need as son is the only breadwinner.
specifications: Manual Mobile Recliner Geriatric Chair with Tray

passiton.name: Geriatric chair
passiton.description: item was being use less than 3 months. Wish to donate out to the less fortunate people who needs it more. Thank you
